SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controller

Klasse PlatformController

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controller.PlatformController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/api/platform") public class PlatformController extends Object
This Class is the Controller for the REST-API path "/api/platform". It provides an interface for all operations that belong to administrate the platform itself
Seit:
2.3.1

  • Methodendetails

    • createOrganization

      @PostMapping("/organizations") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity createOrganization(@RequestBody OrganizationPreview organizationPreview, @RequestParam @NotNull @NotNull String email, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Creates an Organization out of an organizationPreview Allows only access if you are a platformAdmin
      Parameter:
      organizationPreview - the organizationPreview filled with all information to create the organization.
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      the created Organization alongside an 201 Created a or an error if something went wrong.

    • deleteOrganization

      @DeleteMapping("/organizations/{organizationId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteOrganization(@PathVariable String organizationId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Deletes an Organization an all associated information from the system. Allows only access if you are a platformAdmin
      Parameter:
      organizationId - the id of the organization to delete.
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      Ok if successfully deleted or an error if something went wrong.

    • login

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity login(@RequestBody LoginRequest request)
      Logs in a platformAccount
      Parameter:
      request - the request with a username and a secret
      Gibt zurück:
      a valid jwt token alongside an Ok or an error if something went wrong

    • logout

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity logout(@RequestBody LogoutRequest request, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Invalidate the given jwt token Allows only access if you are a platformAdmin
      Parameter:
      request - a LogoutRequest containing the jwt token
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      an Ok or an error if something went wrong

    • refresh

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity refresh(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Refresh a token if its time is over. Allows only access if you are a platformAdmin
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication generated out of a barer token.
      Gibt zurück:
      a new token alongside an Ok or an error if something went wrong
